Weather App

About this project

The Weather App uses Mapquest Geocoding API (https://developer.mapquest.com/documentation/geocoding-api/) to get the latitude and longitude of a certain region, and the OpenWeather API (https://openweathermap.org/api) helps to find the weather with an input of the latitude and the longitude. Uers can enter either a zip code or a name of the region to find the weather. Users can get the Date, the name of the region, weather image, temperatures in either Fahrenheit or Celsius, and the detailed weather information.
